attributes.action: Remove any MP's from parliament who aren't behind brexit
attributes.background: MP's have failed miserably to fulfill what the United Kingdom has voted for, this country has been made to look a laughing stock which will be remembered for decades to come. If the MP's cannot collaborate then they have no place in our government. Britain needs to be great once again!

rejection.details: The Government and Parliament are not responsible for removing MP's from office because of their views and opinions.
